The document provides a list of current and former owners of Indian Super League (ISL) football clubs, highlighting their net worth, sources of wealth, and ownership structures. Current clubs are owned by a mix of prominent individuals (e.g., Abhishek Bachchan, Virat Kohli), groups (e.g., JSW Group, Tata Steel), and companies, with net worths ranging from $131 million to $3 billion, often tied to industries like steel, entertainment, and investments. Former clubs like Pune City and ATK have dissolved, with their owners including celebrities and business groups. The summary underscores the diverse ownership landscape and financial backing of ISL teams.

[S1] List of Indian Super League club owners


# List of Indian Super League club owners



This is a list of individuals, groups of individuals, and companies who have or had owned and operated a professional football club competing in Indian Super League. [S2] Some owners have significant interest in the club, estimated net worth and source of wealth. [S3] ## Current clubs

**The following is a list of current Indian Super League club owners:**

| Club | Owner(s) | Estimated combined net worth | Source of wealth |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Bengaluru | JSW Group | $2.7B | Steel and energy |
| Chennaiyin | Abhishek Bachchan MS Dhoni Vita Dani | $2.74B | Asian Paints Jaipur Pink Panthers Investments |
| East Bengal | Emami Group East Bengal Club Pvt. [S4] Ltd | $2.2B | Emami Supporters trust |
| Goa | Jaydev Mody (65%) Akshay Tandon (23%) Virat Kohli (12%) | $131m | Delta Corp Investments |
| Hyderabad | Vijay Madduri Varun Tripuraneni Rana Daggubati | B.C Jindal Group Investments |
| Jamshedpur | Tata Steel | $1.3B | Tata Group |
| Kerala Blasters | Magnum Sports Pvt. [S5] Ltd | $3B | Tamil Thalaivas Radnicki Blasters |
| Mohammedan | Bunkerhill Pvt. [S6] Ltd.(30.5%) Shrachi Sports (30.5%) Mohammedan Sporting Club Pvt. [S7] Ltd. [S8] (39%) | Bunkerhill Shrachi Sports Investments |
| Mohun Bagan SG | Kolkata Games & Sports Pvt. [S9] Ltd. [S10] (80%) Mohun Bagan Super Giant#Ownership | $3B | RPSG Group Investments Supporters trust |
| Mumbai City | City Football Group (65%) Ranbir Kapoor and Bimal Parekh (35%) | $2.85B | Sovereign wealth Investments |
| NorthEast United | John Abraham (95%) Jaya Balan (5%) | JA Entertainment |
| Odisha | GMS Inc. [S11] | $1.86B | Shipping |
| Punjab | RoundGlass Foundation | Investments Trusts |


## Former clubs

**This list features all the former clubs that featured in the Indian Super League in the past:**

| Previous Club(s) | Owners | Status |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Pune City | Rajesh Wadhawan Group Arjun Kapoor Hrithik Roshan | Dissolved |
| ATK | Kolkata Games & Sports Pvt. [S12] Ltd. [S13] | Dissolved |

The citation [S4] directly references this specific information about East Bengal's ownership, confirming the accuracy of the answer.
